title: Deanne Hastings
description:
Deanne Hastings vanished from Spokane, Washington on November 4, 2015.  I interviewed her brother, Carson, for this episode.  Deanne's story is full of bizarre twists and turns.  Was she drugged and kidnapped like she claimed to grocery store employees?  A man is currently incarcerated for using her credit cards after her disappearance but Deanne is still missing.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
